tool_description: Verifies factual claims against reliable sources and provides evidence-based assessments for content accuracy.
error_messages: Invalid verification depth: Use one of [quick, standard, comprehensive]
Empty claims array: Provide at least one claim to verify
Claims limit exceeded: Maximum 25 claims allowed per verification
Invalid claim format: Each claim must be a non-empty string
usage: Provide claims array and optionally set verification_depth. Returns verification status and supporting evidence for each claim.

verification_status.description: Verification result for each claim: verified, disputed, unverified, false

supporting_sources.description: Primary sources supporting or disputing each claim

evidence_strength.description: Evidence strength for each claim: strong, moderate, weak, none

fact_check_notes.description: Additional notes and context for each verification
